title: Gaerne G.STL resets bar for premium Italian carbon road shoes, teases G.SNX MTB shoes
content:
Gaerne’s new top G.STL road bike shoes reset the bar for fit & made-in-Italy performance with all-new asymmetric Infit + Boa Li2 closure and lighter weight construction overall. With sleek looks and a new iridescent option for the one-piece upper, the new top road shoes also hint at a companion mountain bike version G.Snx that […]

The post Gaerne G.STL resets bar for premium Italian carbon road shoes, teases G.SNX MTB shoes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
